channel.title: In need of a devlopment team with knowlage in c+ c++ and c#
channel.description:
[center]Im in need of people to help me devlope the best EndlessOnline server out there. EndlessOnline [url=http://endless-online.com]Here[/url] is a anime mmorpg that people love, but roughly 400 people play it at once. Im here to introduce a totally new addicting game no joke it is very addicting, and challenging at the same time.[/center]
[center]Contents:
[ul][li]Emulation Project[/li] [li]Some Details[/li] [li]Devlopers on board/Spots[/li][/ul] [/center]
[center][b]Emulation Project[/b][/center]
Emulation for this game has already started, much like RS Emulation it's coded and compiled, but not sure if it's c+, c++, c, or c#. It uses a client obviously ... but everything needed can be edited through the client and verified via the server so to speak. Also like RS Emulation, it uses no-ip or hamachi (no-ip :P) to connect to the server, but does not use character files; instead uses a MySQL Database. The emulation website can be found [url=http://eoserv.net]>here<[/url].
[center][b]Some Details[/b][/center]
Maps can be edited with a map editor, and items stats can be edited using a program a devloper made called pub edit designed just for eoserv. There are two emulators; eoserv and seose. Seose found [url=http://sordie.com]>here<[/url], but Seose is closed and cannot be further edited. If people are interested Im going to be running it on Eoserv.
[center][b]Devlopers on board/spots[/b][/center]
[Hoster] Mod Val
[Head coders] Cain_ --- ---
[Client Editors/Gfx] --- --- ---
[Map Editors] Mod Val --- ---

item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

That’s enough fun with this guy.

@Mod Val, C+ is not a language, but the rest of them you mentioned are. This is also the wrong forum to post something like this in, so I’m going to lock this thread.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“Mod Val, post:17, topic:350847”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=447201.msg3283865#msg3283865 date=1280073332]
JAVA is obviously way better than c+/++ rofl why use that…
[/quote]

Because thats what its coded in.[/quote]Who’s your head C+ guy? Obviously I’m a Java Guru so Java is my best language but I’m really good at C+ too if you guys need a developer. I’ve been meaning to get into one of these but just haven’t found one worth my time…I Think This One Is.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Mod_Val Mod Val
item.description:
@Mod_Val wrote:

Ok, ill post a little bit of what this code looks like.

[code]this->reborn = GetRow(row, “reborn”);
this->guild_rank, “”, “”,this->reborn, this->name.c_str()

this->player->character->reborn += 1;

else if(reborncommand)

{

yourcommand;

this->player->character->reborn += 1;

}

[/code]

Just a few random things I picked out.

@bowserjr2 wrote:

You don’t need to match the language of the server. RSprivate servers uses mostly java only, Jagex uses C, C++ and Java.
Why bother trying to fool other into this, you clearly have no or little skills yourself.
